data.actual_result: Some of the text you type gets deleted from your message box
data.short_description: Putting Discord in the background for a few minutes while new messages are sent, then coming back and typing, will remove some of the text you’ve typed
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord and go to a channel where people are actively sending messages - Put Discord in the background for around 2-3 minutes, and open an app you had open in the background - After the 2-3 minutes have passed, go back to Discord, making sure the app hasn't refreshed from being in the background for too long - Start typing right as you get back to the app, and continue typing up through when Discord loads the messages received while in the background - Observe the text you're typing as the messages load in, but make sure to continue typing, even as the messages are being loaded in
